TopicTitle: Looking for a mod that does futuristic engines

Articles.Content:
This mod should also be stock-a-like and not add any new resources.

Mostly I am just looking for more and better engines to research after all the other stuff in the tech tree is done. I have tried KSP Interstellar but I don't like the plethora of stuff you have to do in order to make everything work.

If you know of such a mod please let me know, I have searched three different KSP mod sites for something like this and can't find anything.
